properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 14.
13 METER S/V HIGH FLIGHT, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN
13-25N 053-46W AT 051034Z JAN. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 659 663 2450.
